name: Scalpel Sniper Rifle
description:
Manufacturer: Kastak Arms
Item Type: Sniper Rifle
Class: Ballistic
Magazine Size: 8
Rate Of Fire: 30 rpm
Effective Range: 120 m
Attachments: Optics (S3), Barrel (N/A), Underbarrel (S2)
The Scalpel is a unique and versatile sniper rifle from Kastak Arms. Designed with two barrels stacked atop of each other, it has two fire modes so you can adapt your shot to the situation. It can deliver a single, powerful shot from a long distance, or fire both barrels in quick succession to create a double-shot burst.
description_cn:
制造商：卡斯塔克武器(Kastak Arms)
物品类型：狙击枪
类别：实弹
弹匣容量：8
射速：30 rpm
有效射程：120 米
配件：瞄具 (S3)，枪管 (N/A)，下挂 (S2)
 "解剖刀"是卡斯塔克武器公司的一款独特的多功能狙击步枪。它拥有两种射击模式，您可以根据情况调整射击模式。它还可以提供一个单次长距离高伤害射击或并发进行双连射击。

shop_buy.layout_name_cn: 斯坦顿(Stanton)-微科星(microTech)-新巴贝奇(New Babbage)-FPSWeaponsArmor
